segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your retirement plans. What are you kind of envisioning for your future?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, I’ve been thinkin’ about it a lot, ya know? I wanna do some travelin’ maybe, like see places I haven’t been, uh, like, Europe or somethin’, and I dunno, maybe settle down somewhere sunny. But, um, also just enjoy time with family, you know? But like, I haven’t really thought about all, like, the details yet, especially not how to afford all that. I mean, retirement feels kinda far away, right?
